summary: Armor n Clothes Conversion for UNP Blessed Body with Breast weighting to support Breast Bouncing PhysX / Animation (BBP). Original Neo Oriental Dress Mod required before installation.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]\"Sexy is different from Skimpy and This outfit is definitly more to SEXY term\"[/b]

[youtube]x4V0S5rLCCk[/youtube] [/center]

Author : xp32 (and Neovinci )

=================================

Add New Dresses and Armours from Far Eastern.

Installation
==========
1. Install original mod from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14642]Neo Oriental Dress for UNP version[/url] 
2. Install Dimonized UNP body
3. Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - Now with BBP[/url] You have to install HotFix to prevent the crash & Please see the installation note for UNPB BBP there
4. Install this Mod or copy Data file to your skyrim folder

Optional Mod Installation
=======================
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13272] VHH walk now with BBP[/url]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11447]Feminine Running and New Dash Animation[/url]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7093]NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB[/url]

I hope you will like this.

Troubleshooting
===============
This is a high polygon geometry meshes, not only twice but almost three times vertices count than the original mod. 
To put it simple, Try this mod if you have pride on your PC\'s spec and performances.

Permission terms from Neovinci for the conversion
==============================================
1. Meshes only
2. Upload and Sharing on \"NEXUSMOD.com\" only
3. simple credit please.

Credits
=======
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=813611]Neovinci[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1006539]Calyps[/url]
Dimon
xp32 (me of course, lol)

[color=green][center]Note: Files provided here is simply request by fan of his works.
As the original creator has given permission for the files to be used with the term above. If in the future happen that the author claim for his work, this files will be removed for download[/center][/color]
author: xp32
